mapper.select: SELECT *,assigneeName as auditorName FROM oa_car_audit_history where id=#{id}

SELECT *,assigneeName as auditorName FROM oa_car_audit_history WHERE assigneeId=#{userId} AND enterpriseCode=#{enterpriseCode} AND content like #{content} AND origin like #{origin} AND destination like #{destination} AND passengerCount= #{passengerCount} AND startTime>=#{beginUseTime} AND startTime<= #{endUseTime} AND carApplyTime>=#{beginCreateTime} AND carApplyTime<= #{endCreateTime} AND (origin like #{searchCondition} or applicantName like #{searchCondition}) ORDER BY createTime DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_car_audit_history (id,applyId,applicantId,applicantName,mobile,isSelfDrive,passengerCount,passengerIds, passengerNames, informType, startTime, endTime, origin, destination, expMileage, content,status,enterpriseCode,createBy,createTime,procInstId,taskId, currentNode,assigneeId,assigneeName,auditStatus,opinion,carApplyTime) VALUES (#{id},#{applyId},#{applicantId},#{applicantName},#{mobile},#{isSelfDrive}, #{passengerCount},#{passengerIds}, #{passengerNames}, #{informType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{origin}, #{destination}, #{expMileage}, #{content}, #{status}, #{enterpriseCode}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{procInstId},#{taskId},#{currentNode},#{assigneeId}, #{assigneeName},#{auditStatus},#{opinion},#{carApplyTime})
mapper.select: SELECT *,assigneeName as auditorName FROM oa_car_audit_history WHERE applyId=#{applyId}
